T5EK.Exhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws
T5EK.SheetEdit.Description: Toggle visibility of add/delete buttons and empty sections
T5EK.SheetLock.Description: Toggle lock for sensitive fields that should not change often
T5EK.EmptySection: This section is empty. Unlock the sheet to edit.
T5EK.GmOnlyEdit: Only your GM can edit this section.
T5EK.AttunementWarning: Attunement: Unable to attune to more than {number} items.
T5EK.SearchHint: Start typing to show search results
T5EK.ItemCardsKeyHint: hold key to interact with card
T5EK.PreparedSpellsMax: Maximum for prepared spells (Note: do not use 'Override' mode on the active effect')

T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.name: Tidy Sheet Settings
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.hint: Customize your own version of Tidy
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.label: Sheet Settings
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.title: T5EK Sheet Settings

T5EK.Settings.TabLocks.hint: Prevents players from making changes to aspects of their character sheets that should change infrequently, and provides the option to completely hide some elements that you don't want to use at all. Settings are available to customize exactly what is locked / hidden, and determine who has permission to make sheets editable through a toggle button.
T5EK.Settings.TabLocks.hint2: Note that this is not a secure lockdown and players could get around the restrictions, so this is not a sufficient answer if your players are malicious. This is intended for games where the players are inexperienced (with D&D and/or with using computers) to prevent them from making mistakes (ex. accidentally adding/removing saving throw proficiency).

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.name: Show item info cards in all layouts.
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.hint: Disable if you only want the slide out item info cards in grid layout.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForNpcs.name: Show item info cards for NPCs/vehicles.
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForNpcs.hint: Disable if you don't want the slide out item info cards for NPCs/vehicles.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.name: Item info cards float next to cursor.
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.hint: Enable to detach item info cards from sheet and float them next to the cursor. Best to use with delay. Also useful when sheet is popped out.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.name: Delay showing info cards.
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.hint: The Item Card will show when you hover an item for the value in milliseconds (0 = no delay, 300 is default).

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.name: Key to hold for Item Card interaction.
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.hint: Enter a key (e.g.: x) to use for item card interaction. Can be any key except function keys (ctrl, alt, etc.)

T5EK.Settings.DefaultTheme.name: T5EK default color theme
T5EK.Settings.DefaultTheme.hint: The default theme for all users who do not have a specific theme selected.

T5EK.Settings.UseClassicControls.name: Use classic item controls in list view.
T5EK.Settings.UseClassicControls.hint: Always show item controls for this type of sheet.

T5EK.Settings.HideIconsNextToTheItemName.name: Hide icons next to the item name
T5EK.Settings.HideIconsNextToTheItemName.hint: If enabled this setting hides the support icons present next to the object name (Favorite, Attunement, etc.), this is usually useful with the 'Use classic item controls in list view' setting enabled in order to avoid a redundancy of icons...

T5EK.Settings.TraitLabels.name: Show Trait Labels.
T5EK.Settings.TraitLabels.hint: Enable to show labels for PC, NPC, and Vehicle traits. Disable to show only icons.

T5EK.Settings.PlayerName.name: Show player name.
T5EK.Settings.PlayerName.hint: Enable to show a field for the player name below the character's name.

T5EK.Settings.JournalTab.name: Hide character journal.
T5EK.Settings.JournalTab.hint: Enable to hide the character journal tab.

T5EK.Settings.JournalTabNPCDisabled.name: Hide npc journal.
T5EK.Settings.JournalTabNPCDisabled.hint: Enable to hide the npc journal tab.

T5EK.Settings.ClassList.name: Hide character class list.
T5EK.Settings.ClassList.hint: Enable to hide the class list below the character's name.

T5EK.Settings.InspirationAnimation.name: Inanimate inspiration tracker.
T5EK.Settings.InspirationAnimation.hint: Enable to turn off inspiration tracker glow animation.

T5EK.Settings.HideIfZero.name: Hide exhaustion and inspiration tracker on 0.
T5EK.Settings.HideIfZero.hint: Enable to hide exhaustion and inspiration if 0. Will show on hover.

T5EK.Settings.InspirationOnHover.name: Show inspiration indicator only on hover.
T5EK.Settings.InspirationOnHover.hint: Enable to only show the inspiration indicator when you hover over the portrait.

T5EK.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.name: Show exhaustion tracker only on hover.
T5EK.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.hint: Enable to only show the exhaustion tracker when you hover over the portrait.

T5EK.Settings.HpBar.name: Disable health bar.
T5EK.Settings.HpBar.hint: Enable to hide the colored bar indicating the remaining HP (Health Numbers will still be visible).

T5EK.Settings.HpOverlay.name: Hide hit point overlay.
T5EK.Settings.HpOverlay.hint: Enable to hide the HP overlay for this actor type.

T5EK.Settings.TraitsTogglePc.name: Toggle empty character traits.
T5EK.Settings.TraitsTogglePc.hint: By default empty traits are always visible. Enable to add a toggle button.

T5EK.Settings.TraitsMovedBelowResource.name: Move traits below resources.
T5EK.Settings.TraitsMovedBelowResource.hint: Enable to move traits from the left side below resources.

T5EK.Settings.AmmoEquippedOnly.name: Only show equipped ammunition.
T5EK.Settings.AmmoEquippedOnly.hint: Enable to only show currently equipped ammunition in Weapon ammo selector.

T5EK.Settings.TraitsAlwaysShown.name: Always show traits.
T5EK.Settings.TraitsAlwaysShown.hint: By default empty traits are hidden by a toggle button. Enable to never hide.

T5EK.Settings.SkillsAlwaysShown.name: Always show skills.
T5EK.Settings.SkillsAlwaysShown.hint: By default unproficient skills are hidden by a toggle button. Enable to never hide.

T5EK.Settings.HideSpellbookTabNpc.name: Hide Spellbook tab on NPC
T5EK.Settings.HideSpellbookTabNpc.hint: By default the spellbook tab on NPC is moved on the attributes tab. Disable this for never do that.

T5EK.Settings.EnableNPCEncumbranceBar.name: Enable NPC Encumbrance Bar
T5EK.Settings.EnableNPCEncumbranceBar.hint: By default the encumbrance bar is not included on the NPC sheet. Enable this setting to include it.

T5EK.Settings.ActiveEffectsMarker.name: Show Active Effects Marker on items.
T5EK.Settings.ActiveEffectsMarker.hint: Enable if you want to see if items have active effects on them (only for list view).

T5EK.Settings.RightClickDisabled.name: Disable right click context menu.
T5EK.Settings.RightClickDisabled.hint: In case of module conflicts or preference you can disable the right click context menu.

T5EK.Settings.ExpandedSheet.name: Expanded Limited view for character sheets.
T5EK.Settings.ExpandedSheet.hint: Displays the entire character sheet (minus the journal) to players with limited permission.

T5EK.Settings.PortraitStyle.name: Round portrait style.
T5EK.Settings.PortraitStyle.hint: Choose to enable round portraits/icons for actors.

T5EK.Settings.EditTotalLock.name: Lock down sensitive fields.
T5EK.Settings.EditTotalLock.hint: Enable to prevent accidentally changing sensible, mostly static values.

T5EK.Settings.EditEffectsGmOnly.name: Only GM can edit active effects.
T5EK.Settings.EditEffectsGmOnly.hint: Enable to deny players to edit active effects on their sheets. They will still see applied effects.

T5EK.Settings.QuantityAlwaysShown.name: Always show item quantity.
T5EK.Settings.QuantityAlwaysShown.hint: Enable to never hide item quantity.

T5EK.Settings.InspirationDisabled.name: Disable inspiration tracker.
T5EK.Settings.InspirationDisabled.hint: If your campaign doesn't use inspiration you can disable the tracker completely.

T5EK.Settings.VehicleMotionDisabled.name: Disable vehicle motion tracker.
T5EK.Settings.VehicleMotionDisabled.hint: If your campaign doesn't use vehicle motion you can disable the tracker completely.

T5EK.Settings.ExhaustionDisabled.name: Disable exhaustion tracker.
T5EK.Settings.ExhaustionDisabled.hint: If your campaign doesn't use exhaustion you can disable the tracker completely.

T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcs.name: Resting for NPCs.
T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcs.hint: Enable to shows the rest icon/buttons on NPC sheets.

T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcsChat.name: Hide chat card for NPC rest.
T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcsChat.hint: Enable to hide the Chat Card for NPC rest (applies to GM and Players).

T5EK.Settings.LinkMarker.name: Mark linked/unlinked NPCs.
T5EK.Settings.LinkMarker.hint: Adds a colored border and icon to linked/unliked NPC sheets.

T5EK.Settings.DefaultSheetTab.name: Default Sheet Tab.
T5EK.Settings.DefaultSheetTab.hint: Select this tab when opening a sheet for the first time.

T5EK.Settings.HiddenDeathSaves.name: Hide Death Saves from Players.
T5EK.Settings.HiddenDeathSaves.hint: Enable to make Death Saves and Death Save Results only visible to the GM

T5EK.Settings.HideSpellSlotMarker.name: Hide Spell Slot Marker on sheet.
T5EK.Settings.HideSpellSlotMarker.hint: Enable to hide the colored spell slot marker, this is usually useful when the spell points variant rule is use.

T5EK.Settings.HideStandardEncumbranceBar.name: Remove/Hide standard encumbrance bar from the character sheet
T5EK.Settings.HideStandardEncumbranceBar.hint: If enabled it will hide the standard bar of encumbrance, if you are using 'Variant Encumbrance' module you probably DO NOT NEED THIS

T5EK.Settings.npcSheetWidth.name: Default NPC sheet width.
T5EK.Settings.npcSheetWidth.hint: The width of the NPC sheet in pixels, requires a refresh to take effect (default 740).

T5EK.Settings.playerSheetWidth.name: Default player sheet width.
T5EK.Settings.playerSheetWidth.hint: The width of the player sheet in pixels, requires a refresh to take effect (default 740).

T5EK.Settings.vehicleSheetWidth.name: Default vehicle sheet width.
T5EK.Settings.vehicleSheetWidth.hint: The width of the vehicle sheet in pixels, requires a refresh to take effect (default 740).

T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterSelect.name: Enable Multiclass Spellbook filter
T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterSelect.hint: If you don't need this for your character, disabling this option will allow you to reclaim the space and declutter your sheet.

T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterIconReplac.name: Cover spell icon with class icon
T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterIconReplac.hint: Enabling this will change the spellbook tab to display the icon for the spell's class instead of the spell's image. Useful for managing multiple lists without having to switch between them.

T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterAdditional.name: Add additional classes for 'Multiclass Spellbook filter'
T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterAdditional.hint: Add additional homebrewed classes to the dropdown with this syntax 'id1|name1,id2|name2' e.g. 'occultist|Occultist,alchemist|Alchemist'

T5EK.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepared.name: Allow cantrips to be 'prepared'
T5EK.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepared.hint: The "cantrip formulas" optional rule from Tashas Cauldron of Everything allows Wizards to prepare their cantrips after a long rest in the same way that they do with leveled spells.

T5EK.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.name: Lock change money for non GM
T5EK.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.hint: This will lock up the money input pp, gp, ep, sp, cp on the tidy sheet for non GM player. All other module working with these fields are working just fine.

T5EK.Settings.LockExpChanges.name: Lock change experience for non GM
T5EK.Settings.LockExpChanges.hint: This will lock up the experience input on the tidy sheet for non GM player. All other module working with these fields are working just fine.

T5EK.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.name: Lock change hp max for non GM
T5EK.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.hint: This will lock up the hp max input on the tidy sheet for non GM player. All other module working with these fields are working just fine.

T5EK.Settings.LockLevelSelector.name: Lock level selector for non GM
T5EK.Settings.LockLevelSelector.hint: Disable Level Dropdown on the tidy sheet under Features Tab or Offer Option to Lock PLayers out from changing it. All other module working with these fields are working just fine.

T5EK.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.name: Lock configure sheet for non GM
T5EK.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.hint: Disable and hide the button for configure sheet on the tidy sheet, to avoid players to use other sheet. All other module working with these fields are working just fine.

T5EK.Settings.LockItemQuantity.name: Lock item quantity for non GM
T5EK.Settings.LockItemQuantity.hint: Enable this to lock the input quantity on the inventory and item sheet on the tidy sheet. All other module working with these fields are working just fine.

T5EK.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.name: Allow Hp Max override on Character
T5EK.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.hint: If enable this module setting will let the GM to manually change the hp max  value on the character sheet.

T5EK.Settings.Reset.name: Reset settings to default
T5EK.Settings.Reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.

dialogs.title: Reset Module Settings
dialogs.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!

T5EK.Settings.Debug.name: Enable debugging
T5EK.Settings.Debug.hint: Prints debug messages to the console

T5EK.Settings.EnableSortFavoritesItemsAl.name: Enable Sort Favorites Alphabetically
T5EK.Settings.EnableSortFavoritesItemsAl.hint: It enabled this setting will sort the items, features, spells alphabetically on the favorites html template

T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnCha.name: Character Sheet: permanently enable unlock if you are a GM
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnCha.hint: Treat the character sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the character, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the character.
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnCha.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnNPC.name: NPC Sheet: permanently enable unlock if you are a GM
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnNPC.hint: Treat the NPC sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the NPC, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the NPC.
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnNPC.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnVeh.name: Vehicle Sheet: permanently enable unlock if you are a GM
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnVeh.hint: Treat the vehicle sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the vehicle, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the vehicle.
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnVeh.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

SheetMenu.name: Tidy Theme Settings
SheetMenu.hint: Customize the colors of Tidy 5e Sheets.

Sheet.title: Theme Settings
Sheet.importDropHint: Hint: You can drag a ".tidy5e-theme" file onto this form to import it.
Sheet.importError: Theme import failed. See console for more details.
Sheet.explanation: Select what color you wish to use for each option. The value "#00000000" is equivalent to disabling the color.

T5EK.VehicleExhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws
T5EK.VehicleExhaustion6: Hit points drop to 0 and the vehicle breaks down
